Key Arguments: The proposed legislation violates democracy and freedom of speech in Australia.
Granting ACMA new powers resembles actions of a communist government.
Fining entities for misinformation leads towards totalitarianism.
The legislation undermines individual rights to free thought and expression.
The government should conduct a media campaign to inform citizens and seek their opinion.
Notable Quotes: Implementing this law resembles the actions of a communist government, rather than upholding the democratic principles on which Australia was founded.
This proposed legislation is a blatant affront to Australia's democracy and the freedom of its citizens.
